```{r set-directories, echo = FALSE}
# Set root data directory path
root.data.directory.path  <- "/Volumes/flow/Documents/archiv/daten/2015/flow-gehen-und-laufen/"

# Set activity directory
activity.directory        <- "walking/" 

# Set user directory
user.directory            <- "grueter-barbara/"

require(flow)

  CreateFeatureDataFrame <- function(directory.path, filename, cols, rows, col.names, additional.features, skip = skip) {
    feature.data.frame <- data.frame()
    if(file.exists(paste(directory.path, file.name, sep = ""))) {
      loaded.features <- read.csv(paste(directory.path, file.name, sep = ""), skip = skip)
      for (i in rows) {
          feature.vector        <- c(loaded.features[i, cols], additional.features)
          names(feature.vector) <- col.names
          feature.data.frame    <- rbind(feature.data.frame, feature.vector)
      }
    } else {
      for (i in rows) {
        feature.vector        <- c(rep(NA, length(cols)), additional.features)
        names(feature.vector) <- col.names
        feature.data.frame    <- rbind(feature.data.frame, feature.vector)
      }
    }
    return(feature.data.frame)
  }
  

    CreateJerkCostFeatureDataFrame <- function(directory.path, filename, interval.ranges, col.names, additional.features) {
    feature.data.frame <- data.frame()
    
    if(file.exists(paste(directory.path, file.name, sep = ""))) {
      data        <- read.csv(paste(directory.path, file.name, sep = ""), skip = 2)
      
      data[, 3]   <- data[, 3] / 10^5
      annomalies  <- DetectAnnomalies(data[, 2], data[, 3], expression("Cycle Interval ("~s~")"), expression("JC (x"~10^5~m^2*s^{-5}~")"), c(.8, 1.3), epsilon = epsilon) 
      data        <- data[-annomalies$outliers, ]
      epsilon     <- annomalies$epsilon
      
      for (i in 1:(length(range.intervals) - 1)) {
        estimated.features <- c(mean(data[, 2][data[, 1] >= range.intervals[j] & data[, 1] < range.intervals[j + 1] & data[, 2] < 1.15], na.rm = T), mean(data[, 2][data[, 1] >= range.intervals[j] & data[, 1] < range.intervals[j + 1] & data[, 2] < 1.15], na.rm = T))
        feature.vector        <- c(estimated.features, additional.features)
        names(feature.vector) <- col.names
        feature.data.frame    <- rbind(feature.data.frame, feature.vector)
      }
    } else {
      for (i in 1:(length(range.intervals) - 1)) {
        feature.vector        <- c(rep(NA, 2), additional.features)
        names(feature.vector) <- col.names
        feature.data.frame    <- rbind(feature.data.frame, feature.vector)
      }
    }
    return(feature.data.frame)
  }

  DetectAnnomalies <- function(x, y, x.lab, y.lab, x.lim, epsilon = 0) {
    X <- matrix(data = c(x, y), nrow = length(y), ncol = 2)
    plot(X[,1], X[,2], xlab = x.lab, ylab = y.lab, pch = 21, xlim = x.lim)
  
    gl <- EstimateGaussian(X)
    p  <- MultivariateGaussian(X, gl$mu, gl$sigma2)
  
    if(epsilon == 0) {
      y <- zeros(nrow(X), 1)
      y[identify(X)]  <- 1
      bt              <- SelectThreshold(y, p)
    }
  
    outliers <- which(p < bt$epsilon)
    points(X[outliers, 1], X[outliers, 2], xlab = x.lab, ylab = y.lab, pch = 21, bg = 2)
  
    return(list("epsilon" = bt$epsilon, "outliers" = outliers))  
  }
```

```{r load-data, echo=FALSE}

# Load FSS features
fss.features              <- read.csv(paste(root.data.directory.path, "features/", activity.directory, user.directory, "fss-features.csv", sep = ""))

# Create data frame for HRV features
hrv.features              <- data.frame()
hrv.feature.names        <- c("sample","meanrr","sdnn","meanhr","sdhr","rmssd","nn50","pnn50","sdann","sdnni","hrvtri","tinn","vlfpeakfft","lfpeakfft","hfpeakfft","vlfpowfft","lfpowfft","hfpowfft","vlfpowprfft","lfpowprfft","hfpowprfft","lfpownufft","hfpownufft","totpowfft","lfhffft","vlfpeakar","lfpeakar","hfpeakar","vlfpowar","lfpowar","hfpowar","vlfpowprar","lfpowprar","hfpowprar","lfpownuar","hfpownuar","totpowar","lfhfar","edr","sd1","sd2","apen","sampen","d2","dfa1","dfa2","activity","activity.start","activity.end","inquiry.end","measurement","last.name","first.name","date.of.birth")

# Create data frame for JC features
jerk.cost.features        <- data.frame()
jerk.cost.feature.names   <- c("mean.cycle.interval", "mean.jerk.cost", "activity","activity.start","activity.end","inquiry.end","measurement","last.name","first.name","date.of.birth") 
epsilon                   <- 0

# Create data frame for CLS features
cls.features        <- data.frame()
cls.feature.names   <- c("activity","activity.start","activity.end","inquiry.end","measurement","last.name","first.name","date.of.birth", "mean.pcoi", "mean.nsei") 

# Load data per session
for (i in 1:nrow(fss.features)) {

  # Set session properties
  properties      <- fss.features[i, c(6:13)]
  activity        <- properties[, 1]
  activity.start  <- properties[, 2]
  measurement     <- properties[, 5]
  last.name       <- properties[, 6]
  first.name      <- properties[, 7]
  
  if(measurement == 1) {
    date.directory <- paste(strftime(as.POSIXct(activity.start / 1000, origin = "1970-01-01", tz="CET"), format="%Y-%m-%d--%H-%M-%S"), "/", sep ="")
  }
  
  
  # Create HRV feature data frame
  directory.path  <- paste(root.data.directory.path, "features/", activity.directory, user.directory, "kubios-hrv-features/", date.directory, sep="")
  file.name       <- paste("ecg-data-", measurement, "_hrv.txt", sep = "")
  CreateFeatureDataFrame(directory.path, file.name, 1:46, 1:3, hrv.feature.names, properties, skip = 0)
  
  # Load jerk cost, estimate and store JC features
  directory.path        <- paste(root.data.directory.path, "processed-data/", activity.directory, user.directory, date.directory, sep = "")
  file.name             <- paste("leg-jerk-cost-data-", measurement, ".csv", sep = "")
  range.intervals       <- seq(0, 900, 300)

  
  # Load CLS indexes, estimate and store CLS features
  cls.indexes.file.name     <- paste("leg-cls-indexes-", measurement, ".csv", sep = "")
  if(file.exists(paste(processed.data.path, cls.indexes.file.name, sep = ""))) {
    
      cls.indexes.data          <- read.csv(paste(processed.data.path, cls.indexes.file.name, sep = ""), skip = 2)
      plot(cls.indexes.data$pcoi, cls.indexes.data$nsei, xlab ="PCoI", ylab = "NSEI")
  
      for (j in 1:(length(range.intervals)-1)) {
        new.cls.features <- rbind(cls.features, c(properties, mean(cls.indexes.data$pcoi[cls.indexes.data$t.s >= range.intervals[j] & cls.indexes.data$t.s < range.intervals[j + 1]], na.rm = T), mean(cls.indexes.data$nsei[cls.indexes.data$t.s >= range.intervals[j] & cls.indexes.data$t.s < range.intervals[j + 1]], na.rm = T)))
        names(new.cls.features) <- cls.feature.names
        cls.features <- rbind(cls.features, new.cls.features)
      }
  } else {
    j = 1
    while(j <= 3) {
      new.cls.features        <- cbind(properties, t(rep(NA, 2)))
      names(new.cls.features) <- cls.feature.names
      cls.features <- rbind(cls.features, new.cls.features)
      j                       <- j + 1
    }
  }
}

# Remove unused stuff
rm(hrv.feature.names, properties, activity, activity.start, measurement, last.name, first.name, date.directory, kubios.hrv.features, kubios.hrv.features.path, kubios.hrv.features.file.name, new.hrv.features, i, j, jerk.cost, jerk.cost.feature.names, jerk.cost.file.name, processed.data.path, range.intervals, X, y, bt, epsilon, gl, outliers, p)
```

```{r time-series, echo=FALSE}
breaks  <- rep(1:3, nrow(fss.features))
```

```{r linear-models, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2), mar = c(3.5, 4, 1, 4) + 0.1, mgp = c(2.5, 1, 0))

linear.model <- lm(fss.features$flow ~ hrv.features$meanhr[breaks == 3])
summary(linear.model)
plot(hrv.features$meanhr[breaks == 3], fss.features$absorption, pch = 21, cex = 1.2, ylab = absorption.expression, xlab = meanhr.expression)
abline(linear.model)
box()
```
